enterprise_cloud_database_create_title: Create a cluster Enterprise Cloud Databases
enterprise_cloud_database_create_descrip: Enterprise Cloud Databases is a fully managed, high performance database cluster service. Using Enterprise Cloud Databases is a powerful alternative to installing, configuring, maintaining, and securing database by hand. Clusters include daily backups with point-in-time recovery (PITR), standby nodes for high availability, and end-to-end SSL encryption.
enterprise_cloud_database_create_choose_: A database cluster runs a single database engine that powers one or more individual databases.
Generally, choose the region where your applications are located. If the database cluster is located in a different region, added latency may slow performance.
You will be able to add, remove, or resize nodes at any time after the cluster is created.
{{ numDefaultNodes }} dedicated nodes are included by default
enterprise_cloud_database_create_additio: You will be able to add, remove, or resize replicas at any time after the cluster is created. 1 replica is included by default.
enterprise_cloud_database_create_billing: You will billed on your default payment method
enterprise_cloud_database_create_success: Enterprise Cloud Database cluster is being deployed.
enterprise_cloud_database_create_error: Failed to create Enterprise Cloud Database: {{ message }}
enterprise_cloud_database_no_default_pay: No default payment method found. You will need to set a default payment method to create a Enterprise Cloud Database. Set a default payment method
